headline: Gencom acquires Ritz-Carlton and Courtyard by Marriott hotels in New Orleans
summary: The transaction — Gencom’s 10th Ritz-Carlton buy — reflects the firm’s commitment to a “compelling” luxury hospitality market.

headline: Host Hotels & Resorts: Deeply Undervalued Despite Recession Risks
